amendment.description: Amendment provides for an exception to the allocation of the funds required in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-99 to insert an exception with respect to the number of meritorious grant applications received for a fiscal year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hall (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Hall (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hall (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
